title: Adding Tags
intro: Tags can be attached to step allow post-indexation or retrieval of the data attached to those steps after runtime. This can be especially useful for post-processing of job data to extract targeted data.

blocks.content: Any step has the ability to add a tag. Simple select the '+ Tags' button to open the Tag Editor
Once open, the Tag editor allows a user to add simple text based tags. The user has the ability to add multiple tags.

blocks.caption: Tags are added by simply typing a tag in the input field and clicking Add
The ability to manage your tags are displayed below the input field. Here it is possible to remove tags, if required, by clicking the cross.
